lines: priya ke naam amit ke patr se maan nirmala ko jab dev kee dasha kee khabar lagee to vah svayan ko nahee rok paee
pannaalaal ko usane dillee chalane ko kaha
vah ab veena kee maanasik dasha ke atirikt kuchh aur nahee soch pa rahee thee
usaka man veena ke dard mein tika tha
veena ke dard ka kaaran dev ka dard tha aur aise mein dev ke lie dunae maangane mein har kshan beet raha tha
ve donon bachchon ko samajha kar agalee bas se dillee pahunch gae
dev kee dasha dekhakar donon stabdh ho gae the
pannaalaal to agale hee din vaapis deharaadoon laut gae lekin nirmala veenaadev ke kahane par vaheen ruk gaee
dev kee dasha hee kuchh aisee thee ki nirmala ka man bhee veena ke paas se hatane ko nahin kar raha tha
shaadee ke samay jo tej dev ke chehare se tapakata tha ab usakee jagah aankhon ke neeche kaalesyaah dhabbon ne le lee thee
dev ka chalana durbhar tha hee ab to sir par hue phode se raharah kar mavaad nikalana shuroo ho gaya tha
baaba jee ke die lep se hee kuchh samay aaraam milata tha
sab jaanate the ki ab devaveena kee niyati ko koee nahin badal sakata
sab jaanate the ki kabhee kisee bhee din dev chala jaega sabase door
usaka aur veena ka juda hona ab lagabhag nishchit tha
amit ko bhee apanee sudh nahin thee
subah se shaam aur saaree raat vah dev ke kamare mein rahata tha
kaam kee baat karana bhool chuka tha
har kisee se kisee daaktar hakeem jyotishee kee hee poochhata tha
daaktaron ka na sunakar usaka dhyaan ab eeshvareey shakti mein laga tha
na jaane kab koee eeshvareeyachamatkaar ho jae na jaane kaheen se koee khuda ka banda aa jae aur dev ko pahale jaisa bhalaachanga bana jae
aur aisa ho sakata hai  usase kaha kisee ne
kaun hai jo use theek kar sakata hai kaun
bhaavavihval hokar poochha usane ghar aae ek mehamaan se
baaba bhootanaath jee
aane vaale mehamaan jisaka naam ratan tha ne bataaya
ve kaun hain  amit kee jigyaasa badhee
baaba jee bahut pahunche hue taantrik hain
unake paas siddhiyon ka apaar bhandaar hai dev jaise kitane logon ka unhonne beda paar lagaaya hai
mere ek chachere bhaee ko maut ke munh se nikaal kar le aae ve chand hee dinon mein
vah mehamaan baaba jee ka anany bhakt jaan padata tha
kya hua tha use  amit ko jaise apane dil kee dhadakan badhatee mahasoos huee
usakee donon kidanee kaam karana band kar chukee theen
daaktaron ne aaaipareshan ka sujhaav diya tha aur vah keval bambee mein sambhav tha
laakhon ka kharcha bataaya
saath hee ghar ke kisee ek vyakti ko apanee ek kidanee denee pad rahee thee
sabhee aanaakaanee kar rahe the
aise mein baaba jee bhagavaan ka roop banakar padhaare
unhonne jaane kya dava khilaee aur kuchh mantr padhe phir apanee laathee ko usake daane pair ke angoothe ke naakhoon par jor se dabaana shuroo kar diya
dekhateheedekhate bilkul kaalesyaah khoon kee ek dhaara vahaan se bahanee shuroo ho gaee
ratan nirantar bole ja raha tha  lagabhag doteen ghante tak khoon bahata raha aur phir vah behosh ho gaya
baaba jee apane haathon se usake shareer kee maalish karate rahe
lagabhag do ghante ke baad use hosh aaya
kuchh der vah saans lene ko ruka phir bola  aisa chakr teen din tak chalata raha
mera bhaee bilkul hilanedulane laayak nahin raha tha
baaba jee usake lie koee davaee chhod kar chale gae
lagabhag ek maheene tak vah bistar par raha
aaj teen saal ho gae is baat ko
vah bilkul tandurust hai
khoob mehanat karata hai
use koee rog nahin
aur to aur jis daaktar ko hamane use beemaaree ke dauraan dikhaaya tha vah yah maanane ko taiyaar hee nahin ki jo riport ab kee hai vah usee vyakti kee hai jise unhonne teen varsh pahale dekha tha
yah suneesunaee baat hotee to main vishvaas na karata lekin jo kuchh bhee hua vah sab meree upasthiti mein hee hua tha
baaba jee aur unake ek shishy ke atirikt keval main hee tha apane bhaee ke kamare mein
usakee baaton se amit ke chehare par aasha kee kiran chamakane lagee
use laga dev bach jaega
vah bhaagaabhaaga dev ke kamare mein aaya
devaveena va nirmala hee the vahaan
ek hee saans mein usane saara vrtaant kah sunaaya
sab baat sunakar dev ka chehara chamakane laga tha
vah jeena chaahata tha
apane lie veena ke lie veena ko khush dekhane ke lie vah jeene kee lalak ko palapratipal apane bheetar badhata pa raha tha
vahaan baithe sabhee log baaba jee ke chamatkaaron kee hee baaten kar rahe the
unakee baaten sunakar sabhee kee aasha aur adhik prabal ho chukee thee
ratan amit ko lekar baaba jee ke kamare ke dvaar par khade ek yuvak ke paas le gaya
amit ka parichay dete hue ratan ne usase kaha  pradeep jee
ye hamaare param mitr hain
thekedaaree karate hain
apane bhaee ko saath lae hain
vah yoonivarsitee mein prophesar hain
kismat kee maar se unhen kainsar ho gaya hai
guda mein
baaba jee ke darshan chaahate hain
saara vrtaant sunakar pradeep jee bheetar baaba jee ke kamare mein chale gae
unhen thodee der hee prateeksha karanee padee
baaba jee ka bulaava aa gaya tha unake lie
ve sabhee ratan ke saath bheetar chale gae
kamare ke sabhee parade band the aur roshanee ke lie keval ek laal battee jal rahee thee
baaba jee ek aasan par viraajamaan the
unake saath hee ek moorti rakhee thee jisake aage jyoti prajjavalit thee
dherasee sugandh phailee thee kamare mein aur agarabattee ka dhuna bhee phaila hua tha
sabase pahale ratan ne aage badhakar baaba jee ke charanasparsh kie
sabhee ne unaka anukaran kiya amit ne dekha baaba jee charanasparsh karavaane ke lie apana daanya pair aage kee or karate the
dev ko choonki jhukane mein kasht ka anubhav ho raha tha baaba jee ne apana pair svatah hee usake haath ke paas rakh diya taaki vah aasaanee se unaka aasheervaad le sake
amit ko yah baat badee atapatee lagee
lekin usane apane chehare ke bhaavo ko chhipa liya
haan to dev tum vishvavidyaalay mein prophesar ho
baaba jee ne kaha
dev kee pratikriya kya huee yah sunakar amit nahin jaan saka kyonki vah usake peechhe baitha tha
krshna ke mukh se nikala  baaba jee aap to antaryaamee ho
dev ke haath jude hue the
sveekrti mein vah keval jee kah saka
yah tumhaaree patnee veena hai
bahut seva karatee hai tumhaaree
sab kuchh bhool gaee hai bas tumhaaree seva hee isaka dharm bana hua
baaba bhootanaath ne phir kaha
jee baaba jee
dev ne kaha
teen varsh pahale guda ko cheer kar nikaal diya tumhaaree
ab krtrim tareeke se malanikaas hota hai
baaba jee ke shabd sabako chamatkaar se kam nahin lag rahe the
jee baaba jee
ab dev gaddagadd hokar jhukane kee cheshta kar raha tha
baaba jee ne usake sir par apana haath tika diya aur punah bole  kainsar kee jad oopar kee or badh gaee hai tumhaare
sir se bahut mavaad nikalata hai  sveekrti mein dev ne gardan hila dee thee
dasha bahut bigad gaee hai
ab samay bahut kam hai lekin meree sharan mein aae ho main tumhaara kasht nivaaran kar doonga
jald hee tumhen kasht se mukti milegee
baaba jee kee baat dviarthee lagee amit ko
lekin shesh sab ne sochee ek hee baat ki dev ko baaba jee theek kar denge

baaba jee ne hava mein haath hilaaya aur palak jhapakate hee dev ko mutthee bhar bhabhooti dee aur kaha  ise kadave tel mein achchhee tarah milaakar din mein doteen baar apane pichhale hisse mein maalish karavaana
jee baaba jee
dev to natamastak ho gaya tha
ekaek sab sunakar baaba jee ke prati usakee aastha badh gaee thee
kal apane chhote bhaee ko bhej dena main use khaane kee dava bana kar doonga
kuchh hee din mein sab kasht door ho jaenge
baaba ne kaha
tab veena ne baaba jee ke charan pakad lie aur phaphakaphaphak kar rone lagee  baaba jee mera suhaag bacha lo aapakee sharan mein aaee hoon
jeevan bhar aapakee seva mein rahenge bas inhen theek kar do
veena ko yoon phaphakata dekhakar sabakee aankhen bhar aaee
aastha mein kitanee shakti hai man jis par vishvaas karata hai us par apana sarvasv nyauchhaavar kar deta hai
aisa hee yahaan ho raha tha
rone se kuchh nahin hoga putree sab kasht kat jaenge too apane pati kee seva mein jutee rah
aur tab baaba jee ke ishaare par ratan ne dev ko uthaane ke lie sahaara de diya
krshna va nirmala bhee baaba ke charanasparsh karake uth khadee hueen
tab ekek karake baaba ne haath oopar karake hava se jaise kuchh pakada aur sabhee ko ilaayachee ka prasaad diya
sabhee gaddagadd hue baahar kee or badh gae
amit ke naam patr aaya tha priya ka
priya kee likhaavat dekh kar hee amit ke man mein chintao ka bojh ulat jaata tha
patr kholakar amit ne jaise hee pahalee pankti padhee samajh gaya kee priya kaaphee gambheer hai
pyaar kee baaton se oopar uthakar aaj vah apana apane parivaar ka duhkh jaahir kar rahee hai
priya ne likha tha
mere priy amit
kaise ho dev jeeja jee ka haal jaanakar man bahut hee duhkhee hai
jo haal unaka daidee ne bataaya hai vah to mujhase suna hee nahin gaya
jeeja jee ye sab kaise sahate honge amit main sochatee thee jeeja jee bahut beemaar hain par unakee beemaaree kee itanee bhayaanak aur duhkhad kalpana mainne kabhee nahin kee thee
jis din se daidee laut kar aaye hain aur meree kalpana ne unakee baaten sunakar unakee beemaaree ke vishay mein jo unakee tasveer kheenchee hai use yaad karate hee rona aa jaata hai
sach amit us din daidee raat dedh baje ke lagabhag ghar pahunche the
ham sabhee unake aane par jaag gae the aur dev jeeja jee ke vishay mein sab jaanakar main raat bhar nahin so sakee
subah tak rona aata raha
aisa bhee kya jeevan ki ve aaraam se so bhee nahin sakate
itana kasht mainne aaj tak kisee ko sahate nahin dekha aur na hee kisee beemaaree ka itana vikrt roop mainne kabhee pahale suna
amit mera man jeeja jee se milane ko bahut bechain hai parantu koee raah najar nahin aatee
main bahut koshish karatee hoon unhen patr likhane kee lekin kuchh nahin likh paatee

aakhir kya likhoon kaise likhoon na to unhen likh paatee hoon ki ve kaise hain unakee tabiyat kaisee hai na unhen saantvana de paatee hoon aur unakee sthiti aisee hai ki na kuchh apanee hee baat likhane ko man hota hai
mujhe kal mile tumhaare patr se jisamen tumane unakee beemaaree ke vishay mein itana hee likha tha ki shaayad main andaaja bhee na laga sakoon ki dev kitane beemaar hain
sach tumane theek hee likha tha
daidee vistaar se na bataate to shaayad itanee pareshaan na hotee main
jaanatee hoon yahee sochakar tumane bataana theek nahin samajha hoga ki mujhe duhkh hoga
daidee ko bhee tumane roka tha sab vistaar se na bataane ko lekin unase nahin raha gaya
dev jeeja jee kee dasha unase bhee nahin dekhee ja rahee
sach veena deedee ye sab kaise sahatee hongee
kitana pyaar hai deedee ko dev jeeja jee se
aur jis insaan se itana adhik pyaar ho usakee aisee dinaparadin bigadatee dasha dekh paana aur use sah paana kitana kathin hai
lagata hai veena deedee patthar kee banee hain
bechaaree meree drshti mein to veena deedee ek nars hain dev jeeja jee ke lie
main unhen patipatnee nahin maanatee
jis din se deedee kee shaadee huee hai us din se aaj tak vah kabhee chain se raat ko so bhee nahin paee hongee
mainne to yahee samajha hai
raat bhar kabhee chaay banao kabhee paanee garm karo kabhee maalish karo kabhee sek karo
ek masheen bhee thoda aaraam chaahatee hai
usako bhee theek prakaar se chalaane aur adhik samay tak suchaaru roop se rakhane ke lie marammat kee jaroorat padatee hai
phir veena deedee to ek insaan hain parantu lagata hai lohe kee masheen se bhee majaboot bana diya hai use usakee paristhitiyon ne
amit is sab baaton se koee taatpary nahin nikalata lekin duhkhee man tumase hee to kah sakata hai ab apane man mein aaee har baat
mera man bojhil hai aur main tumhen jise main apana sab kuchh maanatee hoon likhakar hee apane man kee bojhilata ko door kar sakatee hoon
lekin lagata hai mere man kee bojhilata ko door karatekarate tumhaara man bojhil ho jaega
jo kuchh bhee hua hai aur ho raha hai usamen tumhaara koee dosh nahin hai
amit meree tumase yahee praarthana hai ki tum veena deedee ka adhik se adhik dhyaan rakha karo
main tumhen hee to kah sakatee hoon
veena deedee ne kuchh din pahale ghar mein ek chitthee mein likha tha ki yadi dev ko kuchh ho gaya to main bhee svayan ko samaapt kar doongee
yah padhakar bahut hee dar lag raha hai kyonki ab aisee paristhitiyon mein vyakti kuchh bhee kar sakata hai
jab dimaag baavala ho gaya ho tan kee bhee hosh na ho jeene kee ichchha mar jae aur sabase bada sahaara bhee na rahe to aisee haalat mein kuchh bhee kiya ja sakata hai
isalie amit veena deedee ko kabhee akele na chhoda karo
kisee na kisee ka unake saath har samay rahana bahut jarooree hai
jab tum ghar mein hote ho to adhik se adhik samay unheen ke kamare mein bitaaya karo
yadi unakee koee baat buree lage to bura mat manaaya karo
ab unhen prasann hee rakhane ka prayatn kiya karo
beetee baaton ke vishay mein mat sochane diya karo aur na hee kal kya hoga isakee chinta karane diya karo
unaka khush rahana hee unake lie dava ka kaam kar sakata hai
amit main samajhatee hoon tumhaaree pareshaanee ko
tum khush raho isake lie main tumhen roj patr likhoongee
tumhen lagega hamaare beech kee dooree bahut kam ho gaee hai
amit sach mein main tumhen bahut pyaar karatee hoon
tumhaare bina main jee nahin sakatee
har samay tum yaad aate ho
tum mere sab kuchh ban gae ho sab kuchh
isalie tum par jitana pyaar aata hai kabheekabhee utana gussa bhee aa jaata hai
kahate hain na ki jisase jitana adhik pyaar hota hai usase ladaee bhee utanee adhik hotee hai
kyonki usakee chhotee see buree baat man ko chhoo letee hai aur koee anjaan yadi gaalee bhee de de to man gaur nahin karata
sah leta hai
isalie amit mujhase kabhee roothana nahin
isee ke saath
aseem pyaar ke saath
sirph tumhaaree
priya
amit dev kee dasha se pahale se pareshaan tha
priya ka patr padhakar aur adhik devaveena ke vishay mein sochane laga
priya ka do din pahale ka likha patr tha yah
dev kee dasha to aur adhik bigad chukee thee
aur aaj hee subah usane svayan deharaadoon phon se kisee jaanakaar ko kaha tha ki vah jaakar svayan pannaalaal ko dev ke raharahakar tadapane kee khabar kar den
jaise ant aa gaya hai usaka
shaam tak pannaalaal phir dillee pahunch gae the
dev kee dasha se vah kuchh bolane kee sthiti mein nahin the
maan nirmala kee dasha to dev ko dekhakar bahut kharaab ho rahee thee
usake sir se raharah kar mavaad yukt khoon nikal raha tha
doosaree or ek haath se nirantar glukoj aur doosare se khoon chadhaaya ja raha tha
veena thee ki raharah kar dev ke sir se khoon ponchhatee ja rahee thee
daidee ko dekhakar bhee ro na sakee

jaise robot mein prograam phit kar diya ho ki bas ek yahee kaam karana hai kisee rogee ke sirahaane baith kar usakee marahamapattee bas aane vaalon ko ek najar dekhana use chup rahane ka ishaara bhar karake ek or baith jaane ko kah dena
koee bhaavanaatmak kriya nahin
bas chup
lekin nirmala to aisee nahin thee
rulaee rok na sakee pannaalaal ko aaya dekhakar
kamare se baahar aakar rotee rahee jab tak ki amit ne usake aansoo nahin ponchhe
ab kuchh nahin ho sakata mammee dev ne jaana hai aur vah chala jaega
tab nirmala ne rote hue kaha  kya hoga meree bachchee ka usakee to duniyaan hee ujad gaee
vah phir rone lagee
amit use dev ke kamare se door le aaya
bola  aap dhairy rakhie
ab aansoo na bahaen
ab kuchh aur nahin ho sakata
ghar bhar mein itanee chahalapahal thee ki kisee bhee kone mein akele baith kar baat nahin kar sakate the
kitane hee rishtedaar aa rahe the kitane hee mitragan aa rahe the
sab koee chup se aata dev ko dekhata
kuchh der baahar baraamade mein baithata kisee se batiyaata aur chala jaata
koee kuchh nahin kar sakata tha
daaktar sharma raat gyaarah baje phir aae aur lagabhag ek ghanta dev ke paas baithe rahe
us samay kamare mein devaveenaanirmala aur amit ke atirikt koee nahin tha
rah rahakar dev kee tandra tootatee

saamane deevaar kee or dekhata jahaan usane baaba bhootanaath se milane ke baad unakee tasveer lagava lee thee use pranaam karane ke lie haath uthaane ko prayatn karata jise har baar veena rokatee aur tab munh se yahee budabudaata  mujhe theek karenge baaba jee
mujhe theek karenge
theek nahin hooonga to veena ka kya hoga vah to doosaree shaadee nahin karegee
vah kya karegee vah kaise jeeegee mere bina kaise jeeegee mere bina
tab veena hee bolee  tum theek ho jaoge dev tum theek ho jaoge
tumhen kuchh nahin hoga
tumhen kuchh nahin hoga
baaba ne kaha hai vah aa rahe hain tumase milane
aur dev nidhaal hokar phir chup ho jaata
nirmala ke aansoo bhee veena kee kathor dasha ko dekhakar ruk se gae the
amit ne dev kee dasha ka bataakar apane bhaeeyon ko dillee pahunchane kee khabar de dee thee
